5df75cf16b05c.Name: LLPG - MYSERVICES - address postcode lookup
5df75cf16b05c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59c0a03ddebc1","systemName":"Granicus Solutions Read","query":"SELECT CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) AS display, uprn AS name,
sao AS flat,
pao AS house,
street_name AS street,
town_name AS town , 
county_name AS county,
postcode,
uprn,
ward,
lng,
lat,
locality_name AS locality,
usrn
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search},' ',''))>5
ORDER BY pao,sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 100","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: staticText 1
props.content:
Acupuncture, Tattooing, Electrolysis, Cosmetic Piercing, Semi-Permanent Skin Colouring Premises Registration

You must provide online payment for this registration application. After clicking the submit button at the end of the form you will be taken to our secure online payment website. You can then make the required payment using a credit or a debit card.

props.label: staticText 9
props.content:
This authority is under a duty to protect the public funds it administers, and to this end may use the information you have provided on this form for the prevention and detection of fraud. We may also share this information with other bodies responsible for auditing or administering public funds for these purposes. For further information, go to www.brentwood.gov.uk or contact the Health & Safety Team.

IF ANY PERSON KNOWINGLY OR RECKLESSLY MAKES A FALSE STATEMENT OR OMITS ANY MATERIAL PARTICULAR IN GIVING INFORMATION UNDER THIS SECTION, S/HE SHALL BE GUILTY OF AN OFFENCE.

props.label: staticText 13
props.content:
Cost of application
(single payment and not an annual charge - and covers ALL activities carried out at the premises however each practitioner must make a separate application)
